GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users/:users.description: serves a user object with the following properties: username, avatar_url, name

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object with the following properties: article_id, title, body, votes, topic, author, created_at and comment_count

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates an article votes and reponds with the updated article object

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment to an article and responds with the posted comment

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: responds with an arrray of comments for the given article_id and accepts sort_by and order queries

GET /api/articles/.description: responds with an arrray of articles and accepts sort_by and order queries as well as author and topic filters

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: updates a comment votes and reponds with the updated comment object
